control_attributes.Control: SC-18 (5) ALLOW EXECUTION ONLY IN CONFINED ENVIRONMENTS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization allows execution of permitted mobile code only in confined virtual machine environments.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system generates a unique session identifier for each session with [Assignment: organization-defined randomness requirements] and recognizes only session identifiers that are system-generated.

Control Statement: The organization allows execution of permitted mobile code only in confined virtual machine environments.
Control Name: SC-18 (5) ALLOW EXECUTION ONLY IN CONFINED ENVIRONMENTS
